title: Driven to Dominate: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon’s Historic Run
description: Nathan MacKinnon is rewriting the record books while chasing one goal above all else: another championship for the Avalanche.
content:
DENVER  It does not seem to matter which milestone he reaches or which summit he climbsNathan MacKinnon carries himself with a quiet, almost disarming humility.
He is a player who never assumed he w… [+5448 chars]
de: Zur Dominanz getrieben: Die Geschichte hinter Nathan MacKinnons historischem Lauf. Nathan MacKinnon schreibt die Rekordbücher neu und verfolgt dabei vor allem ein Ziel: eine weitere Meisterschaft für die Avalanche.
en: Driven to Dominate: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon’s Historic Run. Nathan MacKinnon is rewriting the record books while chasing one goal above all else: another championship for the Avalanche.
la: Dominare pulsi: The Story Behind Nathan MacKinnon's Historic Run. Nathan MacKinnon recordum librorum recitat dum unum prae omnibus propositum persequimur: alterum patrocinium in Avalanche.

title: Türkiye braces for avalanche risk as deep freeze hits
description: Türkiye is facing a prolonged spell of extreme winter weather, with freezing temperatures, strong winds and a heightened avalanche risk persisting into the first days of the new year, according to the country’s weather bureau.
content:
ISTANBUL
Türkiye is facing a prolonged spell of extreme winter weather, with freezing temperatures, strong winds and a heightened avalanche risk persisting into the first days of the new year, accor… [+1883 chars]
de: Türkiye bereitet sich auf Lawinengefahr vor, da es zu tiefem Frost kommt. Nach Angaben des Wetteramtes des Landes sieht sich Türkiye einer anhaltenden Phase extremen Winterwetters mit eisigen Temperaturen, starken Winden und einem erhöhten Lawinenrisiko gegenüber, das bis in die ersten Tage des neuen Jahres anhält.
en: Türkiye braces for avalanche risk as deep freeze hits. Türkiye is facing a prolonged spell of extreme winter weather, with freezing temperatures, strong winds and a heightened avalanche risk persisting into the first days of the new year, according to the country’s weather bureau.
la: Türkiye adstringit NIVIS periculum ut alta duratus hits. Türkiye respicit longum carmen extremae tempestatis hiemalis, cum frigore temperaturis, ventis validis et periculo cadentis avalanche in primis diebus anni novi, secundum tempestatem patriae hendrerit.

title: Heavy snow and extreme weather cause sunken vessels and avalanche risk in Alaska
description: Significant weather conditions in Alaska have led to large vessels sinking across the state.
content:
Extreme winter weather has caused large vessels to sink in the Juneau, Alaska, harbor and communities are making preparations for a possible avalanche.
The City and Borough of Juneau Docks and Harbo… [+2155 chars]
de: Starker Schneefall und extremes Wetter führen in Alaska zu gesunkenen Schiffen und Lawinengefahr. Bedeutende Wetterbedingungen in Alaska haben im ganzen Bundesstaat zum Untergang großer Schiffe geführt.
en: Heavy snow and extreme weather cause sunken vessels and avalanche risk in Alaska. Significant weather conditions in Alaska have led to large vessels sinking across the state.
la: Gravis nivis et tempestatis extrema causa sunt naves depressae et periculum NIVIS in Alaska. Conditiones tempestatum significantes in Alaska perduxerunt ad magnas naves per rempublicam deprimentes.

title: Large avalanche in the Făgăraș Mountains, accidentally triggered by two skiers
description: Two skiers accidentally triggered a large avalanche in the Făgăraș Mountains on Friday.
content:
According to Salvamont Sibiu, a large avalanche occurred on Friday in the Bâlea Lac area, accidentally triggered by two skiers in the area known as Balcoane.
The avalanche traveled over 300 meters, … [+560 chars]
de: Große Lawine im Făgăraș-Gebirge, versehentlich von zwei Skifahrern ausgelöst. Zwei Skifahrer haben am Freitag versehentlich eine große Lawine im Făgăraș-Gebirge ausgelöst.
en: Large avalanche in the Făgăraș Mountains, accidentally triggered by two skiers. Two skiers accidentally triggered a large avalanche in the Făgăraș Mountains on Friday.
la: Magnae NIVIS in Montes Făgara, casu urguetur a duobus nartatoribus. Duo nautae casu magnam montem cadentem in Fagara die Veneris urguebant.

title: Avalanches kill two people, injure several others in Italy’s Alps
description: ROME, Jan 2 (Reuters) - A ‌series of avalanches in the Italian Alps killed two ‌people and injured several others on Friday, with strong ‌winds hampering the rescue operations, rescuers said. Read full story
content:

A first a… [+1419 chars]
de: Lawinen töten zwei Menschen, mehrere weitere werden in den italienischen Alpen verletzt. ROM, 2. Januar (Reuters) – Bei einer Lawinenserie in den italienischen Alpen wurden am Freitag zwei Menschen getötet und mehrere weitere verletzt, wobei starke Winde die Rettungsaktionen behinderten, sagten Retter. title: Nathan MacKinnon, Avalanche demolish Jordan Binnington, Blues for ninth-straight win
